values.title: William Shakespeare
values.desc: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none

values.title: Friedrich Nietzsche
values.desc: I'm not upset that you lied to me. I'm upset that from now on I can't believe you

values.title: JM Barrie
values.desc: All the world is made of faith and trust and pixie dust

values.title: Ernest Hemingway
values.desc: The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them

values.title: Maya Angelou
values.desc: Have enough courage to trust love one more time and always one more time

values.title: Corrie ten Boom
values.desc: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God

values.title: Lady Gaga
values.desc: Trust is like a mirror you can fix it if it's broken, but you can still see the crack in that mother fuckers reflection

values.title: David Levithan
values.desc: It was a mistake you said, But the cruel thing was it felt like the mistake was mine for trusting you

values.title: Paulo Coelho
values.desc: None of us knows what might happen even the next minute, yet still we go forward. Because we trust, Because we have Faith

values.title: Suzanne Collins
values.desc: For there to be betrayal there would have to have been trust first

values.title: George MacDonald
values.desc: To be trusted is a greater compliment than being loved

values.title: Doris Lessing
values.desc: Trust no friend without faults and love a woman but no angel

values.title: Oscar Wilde
values.desc: One should never trust a woman who tells one her real age. A woman who would tell one that would tell one anything
